The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents, 尊敬的家长， We request you to register early if you are interested in enrolling your child/children in the ‘Saturday English’ programme at BSG, which will be commencing on August 30th, 2014. All courses are delivered by qualified native-speaking teachers and are open to all BSG and Non-BSG students. 如果您有兴趣为您的孩子报读广州英国学校的周六英语课程，请尽早报名，课程将于2014年8月30日开始。 所有课程都是由合符资格的以英语为母语的老师教授， 英国学校校内和校外的学生都可以参加。 For the next academic year, these are the courses we will be offering: 下一个学年我们将提供以下课程： ‘Cambridge English’ courses for Young learners · Learning Stars Programme – Suitable for students aged 4-5 years (Reception age) · Starters Programme – Suitable for students from Years 1 and 2 For detailed course information and an overview of each programme, click on the links below, choosing your preferred language. 少儿“剑桥英语”课程 · 学习之星课程-适合4-5岁的学生（学前班年龄） · 初级课程-适合1-2年级的学生 For information on The Learning Stars Programme, CLICK HERE For information on the Starters Programme, CLICK HERE To download the registration form, CLICK HERE. Email your completed registration forms to shaila.chainani@bsg.org.cn We will be accepting registrations throughout the summer and in August as well. 下载报名表格，请点击这里。电邮您的报名表至shaila.chainani@bsg.org.cn 我们暑假期间以及8月份都接受申请。 We look forward to seeing you make the most of this opportunity and giving your children a head start in learning English! 我们期待您可以利用这个机会为您孩子 的英语学习创造良好的开端。 Kind regards, Ms Shaila Chainani Head of EAL The British School of Guangzhou
